author: bencomic

right.text: and at night the mad tom wasn't dead yet,so he starded walking,but the he heard a howel,it was cyotes,

left.text: one day u Nadir,or i sould say Mad Tom,was walking down the street, and all of a sudden an Italian Mafia assulted him and left him in the desert to die,
they tore him limb from limb,rip is brains out,suck all his blood,and tore out his inteastines.

title: dan_death wants to tell you a story
